explains: v. 闪光，闪烁；（某种强烈的感情）闪现，流露
n. 闪耀；（某种感情的）闪现，流露；奢华，华丽；（装饰用的）闪亮小物件

sentences.en: There was a triumphant glitter in his eyes.
sentences.cn: 他眼睛里闪烁着胜利的光辉。

sentences.en: Smoothed flat by generations of wind and rain, they glitter in the sun.
sentences.cn: 它们被一代代的风雨磨平，在阳光下闪闪发光。

sentences.en: She was blinded by the glitter and the glamour of her own life.
sentences.cn: 她被自己生活的表面光耀所蒙蔽。
